title: Slaine: the Horned God
description: This amazing The Horned God. is a gem. For the time complete in one volume. "Slaine, master of the warp spasm, wielder of the mighty axe Brainbiter, Celtic warrior king from the time of myths and legends, faces his greatest challenge. The very existence of his world is at stake as he prepares to follow the ways of the Horned God - a path that can give control over nature it self or unleash a new age of witchcraft and dark forces".
author: Pat  Mills
